subject: AI & Agents
title: Tool Security: Principle of Least Privilege
description: A short lesson to help you apply Tool Security: Principle of Least Privilege.

hook.text: If one tool can do everything, one prompt injection can do everything.

buildup.text: Tools are capabilities. Capabilities should match the userâ€™s intent and rights.

discovery.text: Grant least privilege: narrow scopes, short-lived tokens, and explicit consent.

twist.text: Least privilege also improves accuracy: fewer tools = fewer wrong choices.

climax.text: Audit tool usage. Add allowlists per user, per workspace, and per workflow.

punchline.text: Every permission is a blast radius.
